item.title: MAGA’s Messy California Critique
item.description: Botching the small details only gives critics license to revel in their sense of superiority, even when the big-picture allegations are correct.

item.title: A Costly Cease-Fire Deal

item.title: Trump the Coke-Drinker Gets the Ultimate Honor
item.description: The CEO of Coca-Cola presented Trump with a commemorative bottle of Diet Coke for his inauguration, a gesture that speaks to the changing political ti...

item.title: Bob Uecker Has Moved to the Front Row
item.description: ‘Mr. Baseball’ taught us about the sport; he told us stories that made us laugh; he informed us of what was happening when it was important.
